thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 23 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Taiga Building Products Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.20

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Taiga Building Products Qtrly Loss Per Share $0.20
text:
Feb 23 (Reuters) - Taiga Building Products Ltd:
* TAIGA‘S Q3 SALES INCREASED 18.9% TO $329.8 MILLION
* Q3 SALES C$329.8 MILLION * ‍TAIGA‘S BOARD HAS RESCINDED TAIGA‘S DIVIDEND POLICY SET ON OCTOBER 15, 2008​
* QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.20 * TAIGA BUILDING PRODUCTS - BOARD ADOPTED A NEW CORPORATE STRATEGY TO FOCUS ON REINVESTING CAPITAL INTO “INNOVATION AND OTHER GROWTH OPPORTUNITIES​” Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
